resources.string: There is no available network to connect to, Please try again.
Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' the \'blue GPS dot\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings.
Location permission is required for this Application.
There was an error, please try again
